name: SpaceShock_v2
description:
------------------------------------- Retro Arcade space Bullet-hell

Get the highest possible score, or simply manage to survive and advance.
(Good look with the imposible lvl)
Share and challenge your friends to get the best score.

------------------------------------- Controls

Move: AWSD & Arrows

Fire: Left Mouse Click

Special: Right Mouse Click

------------------------------------- Info

Made as a class project, for the subject of video game design at Esat

Made with:

Thx to: Lucas Gonzalez Hernanz for the basic system of creation of enemy and wave system.

------------------------------------- Other

Future Updates:

Make panel to show the controls.
A little particles on shot.
And possibly many more things
